author: Special Correspondent
text:
Kolkata: Continuing her tirade against the Left Front and Congress alliance, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on Thursday dubbed the electoral understanding a “rainbow coalition” and said in the upcoming electoral contest her party would surpass all the political rivals. “CPI(M) , you believe in the ideas of Marx, Lenin, Ho Chi Min and Mao, and now in the Congress. On the other hand Congress is saying Communist-Congress party jindabad,” the Chief Minister said, addressing a rally at Murshidabad.

Incidentally, leaders of Left Front have often used the term “rainbow alliance” to describe the Trinamool Congress(TMC)’s tie up with the Congress and other forces in 2011 when she came to power.
title: Mamata dubs Left-Congress deal a ‘rainbow alliance’
